Title: The Prodigal Son Returns
Writer: Tom Perrotta (based on the book by), Damon Lindelof (created by), Tom Perrotta (created by), Damon Lindelof, Tom Perrotta
Actors: Justin Theroux, Amy Brenneman, Christopher Eccleston, Liv Tyler
Plot: An unexpected ally helps Kevin get out of a jam near the town of Cairo. Meanwhile, an elaborate Memorial Day initiative by the Guilty Remnant plunges Mapleton into chaos.
